name: 1,1-dimethylcyclopentane to generic market for solvent, organic | solvent, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7157/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product 1,1-dimethylcyclopentane to the generic market for organic solvents. All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of an organic solvent.

The activity starts with the reception of 1,1-dimethylcyclopentane

The activity ends with the production of solvent, organic for the generic market
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products
